name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Joseph W. ATKINSON
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Atkinson

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
ROBERTS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.
parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Joseph W. ATKINSON.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Petition for Reconsideration denied.
ROBERTS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Allen B. Zerfoss, Chief Disciplinary Counsel, Harrisburg, John W. Herron, Asst. Disciplinary Counsel, Philadelphia, Samuel D. Miller, III, Asst. Disciplinary Counsel, Norristown, for the Board.
casebody.head_matter:
372 A.2d 1200
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Joseph W. ATKINSON.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 19, 1977.
Decided May 17, 1977.
Daniel Sherman, Philadelphia, for Atkinson.
Allen B. Zerfoss, Chief Disciplinary Counsel, Harrisburg, John W. Herron, Asst. Disciplinary Counsel, Philadelphia, Samuel D. Miller, III, Asst. Disciplinary Counsel, Norristown, for the Board.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
